Comment: Abilities: ANso (Curse of Silence), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Wreaths an enemy unit in a curse which cause damage over time, prevent the casting of spells, reduce movement speed by 25% and reduce attack damage by 50%.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 840 damage over 14 seconds.|n|nSoul Burn lasts twice as long on normal units.
